data.current_summary: Gets details of a UK Vehicle
data.current_description: Gets details of a UK Vehicle
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve vehicle registration details by numberplate
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves comprehensive vehicle registration information for a UK vehicle using its numberplate. Requires authentication with valid username and password credentials. Accepts a vehicle numberplate as input and returns detailed registration data including vehicle specifications, ownership information, and registration status. This operation supports the Car Registration API's core functionality for UK vehicle lookups.
